main event: An unidentified flying object was reported sighted on July 13 and July 23-24, 1964, near Sayre, Oklahoma.
interesting points: The object was observed to increase and decrease in size while pacing a car for about a mile., The object moved overhead at an estimated speed of 1500-2000 mph., The sighting lasted approximately 3 hours on July 23-24., Two people reported the sighting from a friend's porch., The object appeared round, white, and emitted a steady light without leaving a trail.
sighted object: a round, white unidentified flying object
witness description: individuals standing on the porch of a friend's home
